description:
"I can help you laugh, but I can't take away the tears you've shed."

In Mametsubu-cho, a town somewhere in the ancient Japanese city of Kamakura, Ochibi-san lives a relaxed, easy life. With his friend Nazeni the dog, Jack the naughty kitten, and Pankui the hungry dog, Ochibi-san's year in Mametsubu-cho is filled with encounters and new discoveries! Flower-viewing in spring, swimming in summer, collecting leaves in fall, and eating yummy food in winter.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/anno_moyoco)

She is a manga artist and fashion writer, with numerous books published in both categories. Her manga and books have attained considerable popularity among young women in Japan. Though she primarily writes manga of the josei genre, her most popular series, [Sugar Sugar Rune](https://anilist.co/manga/30429/), (serialized in Nakayoshi) is targeted primary at school-aged girls. In a recent Oricon poll, she was voted the number eight most popular manga artist among females and thirteen in the general category. Her manga [Happy Mania](https://anilist.co/manga/30354/) was made into a television series in 1998, followed by [Hataraki Man](https://anilist.co/manga/33068/) in October 2007. [Sakuran](https://anilist.co/manga/32061/) was made into a movie in 2006. Moyoko is married to famous anime director [Hideaki Anno](https://anilist.co/staff/100111/). Their relationship is portrayed in her autobiographical manga [Kantoku Fuyuki Todoki](https://anilist.co/manga/49393/).

[Profile (MONACA)](https://monaca.jp/member/kosaki) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_kosaki)

A Japanese composer and arranger. He joined NAMCO as a soundtrack composer in 1999, and then he joined MONACA Inc. as a music designer in 2004.

Soundtracks he has worked on credited as MONACA: 
- Star Driver: Kagayaki no Takuto (with Keigo Hoashi and Ryuichi Takada) 
- Hourou Musuko (with Keigo Hoashi and Keiichi Okabe) 
- A-Channel (with Kakeru Ishihama, Ryuichi Takada, Keigo Hoashi)

[Official Site](http://doromizu89.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/doromizu89)

Doromizu is an illustrator and animator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Hiroki_Chura)

The current director of Chura Sound.

Tsurii Shougo is a computer graphics artist and designer. He was born in Osaka and studied at Seian University of Art and Design.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mag0c0ro)
Kimura Kashiko is an editor working for Mad Box.

Affiliated with [Studio Khara](https://anilist.co/studio/47/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [editor](https://anilist.co/staff/167279/Takashi-Suzuki)._

[Twitter](https://x.com/Cobalt1604)

Originating from MADHOUSE.

Freelance director. Formerly affiliated with MADHOUSE, Production IMS, XEBEC and David Production.
